snippets.estrutura: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } .box-content-1 { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); grid-gap: 10px; padding: 20px; background-color: #39ee07; color: white; height: 200px; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .banner { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 8fr 3fr; grid-gap: 10px; padding: 20px; background-color: #333; color: white; height: 200px; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .sidebar { background-color: #f0f0f0; padding: 20px; text-align: center; } .content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; grid-gap: 20px; padding: 20px; } .box { padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ccc; background-color: #6e2b2b; } nav ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; } nav ul li { display: inline-block; margin-right: 10px; } .footer { background-color: #333; color: white; text-align: center; padding: 20px; position: fixed; bottom: 0; width: 100%; } header, aside, main { margin-bottom: 10px; }
